title: The Americans Stuck in Afghanistan
sub_head: Months after its retreat, the White House admits some are still left behind.
body:
Remember Afghanistan? The White House would like to forget, but the Americans and Afghan allies still stranded in the country deserve more attention.
“Since August 31, the United States has directly assisted 479 American Citizens and 450 lawful permanent residents” to leave Afghanistan and relocate to the U.S. with their immediate families, the State Department said last week.
